tool.name: UMAP\tSNE\PCA Visualization [SPAC] [DMAP]
tool.description: Generate scatter plot for PCA, t-SNE and UMAP.\ Please refer to DUET Documentation, GitHub Documentation
tool.command: echo '{"figures": {"type": "directory", "name": "figures_dir"}}' > outputs_config.json && python '$__tool_directory__/format_values.py' 'galaxy_params.json' 'cleaned_params.json' --inject-outputs --outputs-config outputs_config.json && python -c "from spac.templates.umap_tsne_pca_visualization_template import run_from_json; run_from_json('cleaned_params.json')"

param.name: Upstream_Analysis
param.label: Upstream Analysis
param.help: Link to prior processed dataset in the analysis.

param.name: Dimension_Reduction_Method
param.label: Dimension Reduction Method
param.help: Dimensionality reduction method to visualize. Choose from 'tsne' or 'umap'.

param.name: Color_By
param.label: Color By
param.help: Color the points in the plot by either their corresponding feature or annotation.

param.name: Annotation_to_Highlight
param.label: Annotation to Highlight
param.help: Annotation name in the analysis to use for coloring the cells in the scatter plot based on the cell label. Can't be used with Feature.

param.name: Table
param.label: Table
param.help: Source table to perform the visualization. Default is Original, referring to the raw dataset.

param.name: Feature_to_Highlight
param.label: Feature to Highlight
param.help: Feature name in the analysis to use for coloring the cells in the scatter plot based on the feature value. Can't be used with Annotation.

param.name: Dot_Size
param.label: Dot Size
param.help: Size of the dot of scatter plot.

param.name: Figure_DPI
param.label: Figure DPI
param.help: Higher the DPI, clearer the image.

param.name: Legend_Font_Size
param.label: Legend Font Size
param.help: Font size of the legend labels

param.name: Legend_Marker_Size
param.label: Legend Marker Size
param.help: Dot size of the legend markers

param.name: Value_Min
param.label: Value Min
param.help: The minimum value of the color bar

param.name: Value_Max
param.label: Value Max
param.help: The maximum value of the color bar

tool.help: **UMAP\tSNE\PCA Visualization [SPAC] [DMAP]** Generate scatter plot for PCA, t-SNE and UMAP.\ Please refer to DUET Documentation, GitHub Documentation **Outputs:** - figures: directory (figures_dir)
